verbs.description: The single biggest story in Atlantic City in the new year [V: will] be the reopening of the former Trump Taj Mahal as a Hard Rock casino resort in the summer
[ARG1: The single biggest story in Atlantic City in the new year] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: the reopening of the former Trump Taj Mahal as a Hard Rock casino resort in the summer]
The single biggest story in Atlantic City in the new year will be the [V: reopening] [ARG1: of the former Trump Taj Mahal] [ARG2: as a Hard Rock casino resort] [ARGM-TMP: in the summer]
